(“TradeTips”) and you, and sets forth the terms and conditions that govern your use of the TradeTips.com websites and other TradeTips applications (collectively known as the "Site" or “Application” or “App”). Your use of TradeTips.com and TradeTips applications constitutes your agreement to all such Terms. Please read these Terms carefully, and keep a copy of them for your reference. \n TradeTips is a Technical Financial Data News Service \n\n\n TradeTips is a subscription-based service (the "Service") where members may have access to our proprietary system, which generates predictive forecasts of financial market behaviors over various time periods. The Service also allows commentary related to stock market forecasts from live experienced investors as well as public users. The system focuses on stock market equities, ETFs, and other financial instruments. TradeTips utilizes machine learning and other techniques to publish probabilistic results. All data generated by our system or Service are for educational purposes only. Neither TradeTips, nor its employees or agents are financial or investment advisors, do not provide financial or investment advice, and make no claims or guarantee of accuracy of any forecasts or predictions derived from the TradeTips Site, websites or applications. Any investments you make, whether based on information from the Site or otherwise, are your sole responsibility.\n You acknowledge and understand that the Site is not intended to supply investment, financial, tax or legal advice, and any prediction or observation concerning any security, trading algorithm, market or investment strategy is not a recommendation to buy, sell, avoid or hold such investment or security or to make any other investment decisions. We offer no advice regarding the nature, potential value, risk, position or suitability of any particular investment strategy, trading algorithm, transaction, security, news or investment. You acknowledge and agree that any use of the Site, any decisions made in reliance on the Site, including any trading or investment decisions or strategies, are made at your own risk. If investment, trading or other professional advice is required, the services of a competent, licensed professional should be sought. No employee, agent or representative of TradeTips is authorized to provide any such advice pursuant to this Agreement, and any such advice, if given, is in violation of TradeTips’ policies, is unauthorized and may not be relied upon.\n Privacy\n Your use of TradeTips.com and other TradeTips applications is subject to TradeTips' Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the Site and informs users of our data collection practices. For more information please see TradeTips.com for details. \n\n Electronic Communications You consent to receive electronic communications and you agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures and other communications that we provide to you electronically, via email, application and on the Site, satisfy any legal requirement that such communications be in writing.\n Your Account\n If you use the Site, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to any computer or other device used by you, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. You may not assign or otherwise transfer your account to any other person or entity or authorize any other person to utilize your login information or password. Notwithstanding the foregoing, you are entirely responsible for any and all activities and conduct, whether by you or anyone else, that are conducted through your account. You acknowledge that TradeTips is not responsible for third party access to your account that results in or from theft or misappropriation of your account information. TradeTips and its associates reserve the right to refuse or cancel service, terminate accounts, or remove or edit content in our sole discretion. \n TradeTips does not knowingly collect, either online or offline, personal information from persons under the age of thirteen. If you are under 18, you may use TradeTips.com only with permission of a parent or guardian.\n Links to Third Party Sites/Third Party Services\n TradeTips.com, and the Site may contain links to other apps, websites and services ("Linked Sites"). The Linked Sites are not under the control of TradeTips and TradeTips is not responsible for the contents of any Linked Site, including without limitation any link contained in a Linked Site, or any changes or updates to a Linked Site. Settings Messages Sync Your signature Default reply action Sync email periodically Download incoming attachments Automatically download attachments for incoming emails Only download attachments when manually requested Subscription Subscribe Know More See More See Less see_less FAQs Contact us Mentor Tips AI Tips Tips Filter Reset Settings Subscription Plan Subscriptions Book time with a Mentor Play App Overview Demo FAQ\'s Suggest an App Improvement Contact Us Become a Mentor Visit %s\'s Profile Tweet tip Remove Tip Create Room Room Name You can You are Tweeted Saved Tip Get the most out \nof TradeTips \ntoday! 1. Post comments on Mentor tips and then track the response here. 2. Save tips and we we\'ll list all of them here for you. 3. Tweet tips and get advice from your Twitter followers here. Chat Room One 1. We believe in personal rights and freedom. 2. This space is for sharing winning trades and investing strategies. 3. The app is here to help anyone make money in the market … so come on in. Can you trade on TradeTips? No, you cannot trade on TradeTips today. We are far more interested in giving you the tools to help you become a successful investor, than getting you access to the stock market.\n\nUse TradeTips as a companion to your favorite (hopefully $0 fees) trading app What is a TradeTips Mentor? TradeTips is a technology platform that allows the aggregation of investing coaches and trading experts, we call them and “Mentors”.\n\nThey all must go through a strong vetting process before being allowed to join TradeTips as a Mentor, and are the only ones allowed to create and post stock tips on the app. Can I talk directly to a Mentor? Yes, we strongly encourage you to reach out to Mentors with your questions and comments.\n\nThere are several ways to communicate with a Mentor:\n\n1. Click on a Mentor’s Tip and leave a comment for them on the Tip Detail.\n\n2. Ask them a question in the Public Chat Room.\n\n3. Take a Mentor’s group class in a their own chat room.\n\n4. Book time with a Mentor in 1-on-1 training sessions. Can I become a TradeTips Mentor? Yes, we would like our members who are serious about investing and who have a great track record to reach out to us: Click Here. Can I communicate with friends on the app? Yes, you can connect with friends on TradeTips.\n\n1. Click on a Mentor’s Tip and leave a comment for them on the Tip Detail.\n\n2. Communicate with them in the Public Chat Room.\n\n3. Take a Mentor’s group class together with your friends.\n\n4. Tweet a mentor tip to your own Twitter feed and get advice on the stock tip from friends there.\n\n5. Follow friends who are on the app and share ideas on tips. Can I learn to invest on the app? Yes, we designed the app to help people who do not know much about investing, get started and take charge of their financial lives.\n\nYou can begin to learn by asking questions in the Chat Room One and on Mentor Tips. Then we recommend taking a class with a Mentor or sign up for a 1-on-1 session with a mentor. What do I get for my subscription? 1. Continued access to all the Mentor tips and AI generated Tips.\n\n2. Access to Mentor’s 1-on-1 sessions and classes.\n\n3. Access to other chat rooms and exclusive app only events.\n\n4. Automatic track and notify you when the stocks you choose are in a position to buy or sell.\n\n5. Access to 5-Day AI Predictions for all stocks.\n\nMost importantly, you get a community of members and Mentors who are dedicated to helping you make money from the stock market … we want you to make money … you … yes you, specifically. That’s our goal. What if I want a refund? Get ALL your money back on all subscription plans up to 7 days after becoming a member. No question asked. Special Offers, Discount Deals and Promo Codes are not included.\nSimple and straightforward.\nContact us here. Can I start a chat room? Nope, only Mentors can start chat rooms. You can ask a Mentor to start a chat room with a topic for you though. Can I follow someone on the app? Yes. Click on any user’s profile icon or photo or their name. Then on their profile screen click the button that says “Follow”. If the button says “Following” you are then following that user.\n\nYou can also look at their Following tab on their profile and see who they are Following … if you would like to expand your network. Can I change my username? No, your username is set once you create the account. Please reach out to us on TradeTipsApp.com if you have an issue with your username. Can I change my user photo? Yes. Click on the profile icon or the edit text on your profile screen.\n\nThen give TradeTips access to your camera and photos to provide us with a photo of you. What about sharing on social media? We currently allow sharing of Mentor Tips on Twitter through the app.\nWe would like to expand this to other social media applications. If you would like us to share information on a specific platform, let us know which ones by contacting us at sayhello@tradetipsapp.com. Confirm Details Credit Card Information Card Detail Transaction failed These are some possible issues See All Make Payment View Details MACD is a mathematical indicator for stock investors that uses the average closing prices of a stock in 2 timeframes, a short-term (past 9 days) and a longer-term (past 26 days).\n\nWhen the short-term average closing prices (called a moving average) crosses over the longer-term moving average from below heading up, that is a sign to investors to buy the stock.\n\nThe reverse is true when the short-term moving average crosses the longer-term moving average from above heading down. That is a sign to sell the stock.\n\nTradeTips makes knowing when a MACD signal happens by just sending you the list all S&P500 and Nasdaq100 stocks that just had a buy or sell crossover event the day before.
